|zh                 = 
:'''派蒙：'''欸，你怎么一副神神秘秘的样子？
:'''旅行者：'''咳咳&mdash;&mdash;
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙，你相信命运吗？
:'''派蒙：'''啊啊啊，现在看起来更奇怪了啦！
:'''旅行者：'''那天我在须弥城里闲逛，向娜比雅学习了一些占卜知识。
:'''旅行者：'''怎么样，要听听最近的运势吗？
:'''派蒙：'''好吧，那、那你说说看。
:'''旅行者：'''根据咖啡杯底的形状来看…
:'''旅行者：'''预示着我最好的伙伴，接下来的旅程遇到的都是开心的事，还会拥有很多好吃的哦。
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙，生日快乐！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「派蒙，生日快乐！」
|en                 =
:'''Paimon:''' Hey... Why are you acting all mysterious?
:'''Traveler:''' Ahem&mdash;
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon, do you believe in fate?
:'''Paimon:''' Ahhhhh, now you're acting even weirder!
:'''Traveler:''' I was out for a stroll in [[Sumeru City]] the other day, and just so happened to learn a little fortune-telling from [[Nabiya]].
:'''Traveler:''' What do you think, Paimon? Wanna hear your fortune?
:'''Paimon:''' S&mdash;Sure. Hit Paimon with it.
:'''Traveler:''' From the shapes forming at the bottom of this coffee cup...
:'''Traveler:''' It looks like my bestest travel companion will only encounter happy things in her journey ahead. She'll also get to eat lots of delicious food.
:'''Traveler:''' Happy birthday, Paimon!
